channel.title: Wisdoms on Dixit Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Wisdoms on Dixit Patel

item.title: Quotes
item.description: I often come across inspirational content/quotes on the internet that I keep stockpiling into my Evernote. Below are tidbits from this diary of growing wisdom. The lessons and learning come hard, sometimes hitting home with as much recklessness as Roy Keane’s tackles on field hah! Hope you like them! Maria Popova Do Lectures. I’ve always found her content on BrainPickings to be very thought provoking. Allow yourself the uncomfortable luxury of changing your mind.
